2020 in Review: Covid-19 in England

Date: 31/12/2020

While night clubs reopen in Wuhan, families in the UK were unable to visit eachother at Christmas. How did on of the world's biggest economy end up having one of the largest number of deaths from Covid-19 per capita?

2020 Timeline: Covid-19 in England

Date: 31/12/2020

A timeline of key events regarding UK policy on Covid-19 and how the coronavirus has impacted England. See how policy affected the statistics on Covid-19.
